author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM HONE SOUTHEAST OF SOUTH POINT ON THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM HONE SOUTHEAST OF SOUTH POINT ON THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 8:30 PM HST Sat Aug 24
 the center of Hone was located near 18.1, -155.0
 with movement W at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 991 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.
